channel.title: Re-sizable 414
channel.description:
Hey everybody,
I was attempting a project on the 317 that involved a lot of custom interfaces that were just all too fun to make with Lin's Editor, and while that was just great I decided I liked the 400+ interface system better. With this said, I wanted to keep most of the look and feel of the 317 client while having the interface system and the music system as well. It might be easier to just convert the interface system in the 317 client over, and add the music system, but it seemed like a fun project to make the 414 client re-sizable. I'm going to work on this while simultaneously trying to write an interface editor for 400+, which, if all goes well, I will release to the public. [hr]
Key: Green - Completed Orange - In progress, and to save your eyes from the strain of yellow on this forum Red - not yet started
List of things I want to accomplish:
[ul][li]Buttons for Fixed and Re-sizable[/li] [list] [li]On title screen[/li] [li]In game on settings interface[/li] [/list] [li]Adjusting Gameframe Location[/li] [list] [li]Stopping gameframe flickering when in full screen[/li] [li]Correct clicking areas when gameframe is re-sized[/li] [/list] [li]Correct Interface Positioning[/li] [list] [li]Title screen background and boxes[/li] [li]In-game non-fullscreen interfaces[/li] [li]In-game fullscreen interfaces[/li] [/list][/ul]
[hr] Here's some pictures of my progress: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m0WcrLj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0KXQcJl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y6tNHJo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/avcxHq2.png[/img]

item.title: Re-sizable 414
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Ashi:

Judging by that last picture, you’re pretty much done. The interface is the easy bit from what I remember.

Having a bit of an issue when creating the resizable client from the button. It’s creating it but it’s like it’s delayed on the input of clicking and typing, and the flames go in the wrong position… Really awkward. I think it has to do with the way the new client is created. I’m going to have to look at a 508 or something I think.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Hey everybody,

I was attempting a project on the 317 that involved a lot of custom interfaces that were just all too fun to make with Lin’s Editor, and while that was just great I decided I liked the 400+ interface system better. With this said, I wanted to keep most of the look and feel of the 317 client while having the interface system and the music system as well. It might be easier to just convert the interface system in the 317 client over, and add the music system, but it seemed like a fun project to make the 414 client re-sizable. I’m going to work on this while simultaneously trying to write an interface editor for 400+, which, if all goes well, I will release to the public.
[hr]

Key:
Green - Completed
Orange - In progress, and to save your eyes from the strain of yellow on this forum
Red - not yet started

List of things I want to accomplish:

[ul][li]Buttons for Fixed and Re-sizable[/li]
[list]

[/list]
